articles.title: Oil prices ease as bearish China data fuels demand concerns - The Economic Times
articles.description: The world's top exporter Saudi Arabia last week extended its voluntary production cut of 1 million bpd to the end of September, adding that it could be extended beyond then or deepened. Russia also said it would cut oil exports by 300,000 bpd in September.
